profile.name: Brad Fitzpatrick
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Tailscale | Networking and Security Expert
profile.summary: Highly motivated software engineer with a strong passion for networking, security, and system administration. Proven track record of contributing to open-source projects and delivering high-quality solutions.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Designed and implemented a secure VPN solution for remote teams using Tailscale's proprietary protocol.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop and maintain the Tailscale platform, ensuring seamless scalability and performance.
Developed and maintained extensive documentation for the Tailscale project, making it easier for users to onboard and troubleshoot.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Contributed to multiple open-source projects, including perkeep/perkeep, tailscale/tailscale, tink-crypto/tink-go, and winfsp/go-winfsp.
Developed and maintained several custom tools and scripts for clients, improving their overall efficiency and productivity.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Responsible for bug fixes, feature implementations, and documentation for the perkeep project.
Collaborated with other maintainers to ensure the project's stability and security.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed custom solutions for clients using various programming languages, including Go.
Improved the overall quality and performance of their projects through extensive testing and debugging.
